title: Poehler Invented Galentine’s, Now Retailers Embrace It
itunes:title: Poehler Invented Galentine’s, Now Retailers Embrace It
description:
Bloomberg News Retail Reporter Jordyn Holman discusses how the fictional Galentine's Day, created by Amy Poehler, is now a legitimate part of the greeting card and gift industries. She says consumers are spending money on friends as well as sweethearts this Valentine's season. Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
